About.title_2: Coursera partners with more than 350+ leading universities and companies to bring flexible, affordable, job-relevant online learning to individuals and organizations worldwide.
About.Card_1_description1: Learn from experts at 350+ leading universities and companies.
About.Card_1_description2: Earn recognized credentials from leading universities and companies to achieve your goals.
About.Card_2_description1: Explore hundreds of free courses or get started with a free trial.
About.Card_2_description2: Earn a university degree and enjoy high-quality curriculum, affordable pricing, and flexible scheduling.
About.Card_3_description1: Get on-demand lectures for desktop and mobile—on your schedule.
About.Card_3_description2: Choose from free courses, hands-on projects, certificate programs, and stackable credentials.
About.Card_4_description1: Master essential career skills based on comprehensive skills data.
About.Card_4_description2: Master essential career skills based on comprehensive skills data.
